languages.text: "Да?..." {n}На лице друкари появляется выражение глубочайшего недоумения.{/n} "И твое изумление заставляет меня думать, что мон-кай еще примитивнее, чем я подозревал. Не говори мне, что узы крови налагают на вас какие-то особые запреты и табу".

"Yes?" {n}The Drukhari looks deeply confused.{/n} "Your astonishment is making me think that the mon-keigh are even more primitive than I first suspected. Do not tell me that blood ties carry certain prohibitions and taboos among your kind?"
languages.original_text: "Да?..." {n}На лице друкари появляется выражение глубочайшего недоумения.{/n} "И твое изумление заставляет меня думать, что мон-кай еще примитивнее, чем я подозревал. Не говори мне, что узы крови налагают на вас какие-то особые запреты и табу".

traits.locale_text: "Yes?" {n}The Drukhari looks deeply confused.{/n} "Your astonishment is making me think that mon-keigh are even more primitive than I first suspected. Do not tell me that blood ties carry certain prohibitions and taboos among your kind?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes?" {n}The Drukhari looks deeply confused.{/n} "Your astonishment is making me think that mon-keigh are even more primitive than I first suspected. Do not tell me that blood ties carry certain prohibitions and taboos among your kind?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes?" {n}The Drukhari looks deeply confused.{/n} "Your astonishment is making me think that mon-keigh are even more primitive than I first suspected. Do not tell me that blood ties carry certain prohibitions and taboos among your kind?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes?" {n}The Drukhari looks deeply confused.{/n} "Your astonishment is making me think that mon-keigh are even more primitive than I first suspected. Do not tell me that blood ties carry certain prohibitions and taboos among your kind?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “怎么了？”{n}玛拉斋看起来非常困惑。{/n}“你震惊的表情让我不禁在想，或许你们猴子比我想象得要更加原始。对你的族群而言，血缘关系该不会意味着某些特定的禁忌吧？”
languages.original_text: "Yes?" {n}The Drukhari looks deeply confused.{/n} "Your astonishment is making me think that the mon-keigh are even more primitive than I first suspected. Do not tell me that blood ties carry certain prohibitions and taboos among your kind?"

traits.locale_text: “怎么了？”{n}玛拉斋看起来非常困惑。{/n}“你震惊的表情让我不禁在想，或许你们猴子比我想象得要更加原始。对你的族群而言，血缘关系该不会意味着某些特定的禁忌吧？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「何？」{n}デュカーリはひどく混乱しているようだ。{/n}「そうも驚かれると、モン＝ケイは最初の印象よりはるかに原始的な生き物だったのかと疑っちまう。まさかお前らの種族には、血の繋がりにある種の禁忌やタブーがあるとでも言うのか？」
languages.original_text: "Yes?" {n}The Drukhari looks deeply confused.{/n} "Your astonishment is making me think that the mon-keigh are even more primitive than I first suspected. Do not tell me that blood ties carry certain prohibitions and taboos among your kind?"

traits.locale_text: 「何？」{n}デュカーリはひどく混乱しているようだ。{/n}「そうも驚かれると、モン＝ケイは最初の印象よりはるかに原始的な生き物だったのかと疑っちまう。まさかお前らの種族には、血の繋がりにある種の禁忌やタブーがあるとでも言うのか？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Sí?» {n}El drukhari parece muy confundido.{/n} «Tu asombro me hace pensar que los mon-keigh son aún más primitivos de lo que sospechaba. No me dirás que los lazos de sangre conllevan ciertas restricciones y tabúes en tu especie».
languages.original_text: "Yes?" {n}The Drukhari looks deeply confused.{/n} "Your astonishment is making me think that the mon-keigh are even more primitive than I first suspected. Do not tell me that blood ties carry certain prohibitions and taboos among your kind?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Sí?" {n}El drukhari parece muy confundido.{/n} «Tu asombro me hace pensar que los mon-keigh son aún más primitivos de lo que sospechaba. No me dirás que los lazos de sangre conllevan ciertas restricciones y tabúes en tu especie».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Oui ? {n}répond le Drukhari, l'air profondément perplexe.{/n} À en juger par votre étonnement, il faut croire que les mon-keigh sont encore plus primitifs que je le pensais. Ne me dites pas que les liens du sang font l'objet d'interdits et d'autres tabous au sein de votre civilisation... »
languages.original_text: "Yes?" {n}The Drukhari looks deeply confused.{/n} "Your astonishment is making me think that the mon-keigh are even more primitive than I first suspected. Do not tell me that blood ties carry certain prohibitions and taboos among your kind?"

traits.locale_text: « Oui ? {n}répond le Drukhari, l'air profondément perplexe.{/n} À en juger par votre étonnement, il faut croire que les mon-keigh sont encore plus primitifs que je le pensais. Ne me dites pas que les liens du sang font l'objet d'interdits et d'autres tabous au sein de votre civilisation... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ja?" {n}Der Drukhari schaut dich total verwirrt an.{/n} "Euer Erstaunen führt mich zu dem Schluss, dass Chem-Pan-Sey noch wesentlich primitiver sind, als ich zunächst vermutet habe. Wollt Ihr mir sagen, dass Blutsbande bei euch mit gewissen Verboten und Tabus einhergehen?"
languages.original_text: "Yes?" {n}The Drukhari looks deeply confused.{/n} "Your astonishment is making me think that the mon-keigh are even more primitive than I first suspected. Do not tell me that blood ties carry certain prohibitions and taboos among your kind?"

traits.locale_text: "Ja?" {n}Der Drukhari schaut dich total verwirrt an.{/n} "Euer Erstaunen führt mich zu dem Schluss, dass Chem-Pan-Sey noch wesentlich primitiver sind, als ich zunächst vermutet habe. Wollt Ihr mir sagen, dass Blutsbande bei euch mit gewissen Verboten und Tabus einhergehen?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Yes?" {n}The Drukhari looks deeply confused.{/n} "Your astonishment is making me think that mon-keigh are even more primitive than I first suspected. Do not tell me that blood ties carry certain prohibitions and taboos among your kind?"

languages.text: "Evet?" {n}Drukhari, oldukça kafası karışmış bir hâlde bakıyor.{/n} "Şaşkınlığın, bana mon-keighlerin ilk başta şüphelendiğimden daha da ilkel olduğunu düşündürüyor. Soyunun gözünde kan bağlarının belli başlı yasaklar ve tabular taşıdığını söyleme bana."
languages.original_text: "Yes?" {n}The Drukhari looks deeply confused.{/n} "Your astonishment is making me think that the mon-keigh are even more primitive than I first suspected. Do not tell me that blood ties carry certain prohibitions and taboos among your kind?"

traits.locale_text: "Evet?" {n}Drukhari, oldukça kafası karışmış bir hâlde bakıyor.{/n} "Şaşkınlığın, bana mon-keighlerin ilk başta şüphelendiğimden daha da ilkel olduğunu düşündürüyor. Soyunun gözünde kan bağlarının belli başlı yasaklar ve tabular taşıdığını söyleme bana."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
